titleStmt.title: Mysterium sigillorum, herbarum & lapidum containing a compleat cure of all sicknesses and diseases of mind and body by means of the influences of the seven planets, adorned with copper plates & figures, shewing the foundation of this astronomical and coelestial science / written originally in Saxon, by ... Israel Hibner ... ; now translated into English for B. Clayton ...
titleStmt.author: Hiebner, Israel.
Clayton, B. (Billidge)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Downing, and are to be sold by S. Smith ..., A. Roper ..., and P. Buck ..., W. Battersby ..., S. Herrick ..., W. Feltham ..., and by most booksellers about London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
